snippet: Making it clear that he does not use marijuana, Mr. Robertson, an evangelist, said he supports legalization because the war on drugs has failed.
abstract: Evangelical leader Pat Robertson surprises many of his followers by openly advocating the legalization of marijuana, arguing that it is a way to bring down soaring rates of incarceration and reduce the social and financial costs of the war on drugs; remarks are hailed by pro-legalization groups.
lead_paragraph: Making it clear that he does not use marijuana, Mr. Robertson, an evangelist, said he supports legalization because the war on drugs has failed.

headline.main: Pat Robertson Says Marijuana Use Should be Legal
headline.print_headline: Pat Robertson Says Marijuana Use Should be Legal
